name: Windforge
blurb: CONTRA meets MINECRAFT in a building-block RPG! Explore an ever-changing steampunk world featuring Airships & Sky Whales!

rewards.reward: FOUNDER\r\n==============================\r\nA custom made E-Card thanking you for your contribution to Windforge as well as your name in the credits as a Citizen of Cordeus!
WINDFORGE\r\n==============================\r\nA Digital Copy of Windforge! (Includes previous reward.)

PROFESSIONAL
==============================
Exclusive Wallpaper and a Digital Instruction Manual teaching you the ins and outs of Windforge!
(Includes all previous rewards.)

EARLY BIRD
==============================
Don't want to wait for the 2014 release of Windforge? Get a Pre-Release and play it in December 2013!!
(Includes all previous rewards.)
DOUBLE DOSE ============================== One digital copy of Windforge not enough? Want to get one for your friend? Get a second copy and save 20%! (Includes Thank You E-Card.)

ART AFICIONADO
==============================
Beautiful Windforge artwork from our very own artists in a Digital Art Book! Includes your name in the credits as a Chief Engineer.
(Includes all previous rewards.)

MUSIC LOVER
==============================
A digital version of the Windforge Soundtrack by Ottawa-based composer Mike Keogh.
(Includes all previous rewards.)
EARLY DOUBLE ============================== Get a Pre-Release copy of Windforge for you AND for a friend, to play in December 2013! Save 30% just in time for Christmas! (Includes Thank You E-Card.)

FAN CLUB
==============================
A Windforge T-Shirt featuring a Sky Whale vs Kraken design that is only available to backers! Includes your name in the credits as a Dirigible Captain!
(Includes all previous rewards.)

SKY GEAR
==============================
Have some extra fun with some crazy, cool In-Game Weapons! Exclusive to backers!
(Includes all previous rewards.)

IMMORTALIZATION 1
==============================
NPCs are constant in Windforge's procedural world! Name an NPC (to our discretion)! Includes your name in the credits as a Baron / Baroness
of Englestrome!
(Includes all previous rewards.)

SKY FLASK\r\n============================== Always be prepared for the worst case scenario! Carry around your spirits in style! Get the new EXCLUSIVE Windforge Flask! Sky Whale Essence sold separately. (Includes all previous rewards except the previous reward.)

CUSTOM ID FOLIO ============================== Are your fellow Townsmen questioning your alliance? Prove your loyalty with your very own Custom Citizen of Cordeus ID Folio! Steampunk style, hand crafted identification folio. Personalize with your own character's information! (Includes all previous rewards except the previous two rewards.)

FLASK & FOLIO ============================== \r\nNot sure whether you want the Exclusive Windforge Flask or the Custom Citizen of Cordeus Folio? Get both! What a great deal! (Includes all previous rewards except the Immortalization reward.)
ARTIST CREATION\r\n==============================\r\nAn Original Windforge Sketch, hand drawn and signed by one of our very talented artists. (Includes all except the previous reward.)

IMMORTALIZATION 2\r\n==============================\r\nYour Likeness In the Game! Have your picture digitized into a framed portrait hanging on a wall in a town of Cordeus (to our discretion)! (Includes all except previous two rewards.)

ENGINEER (SALE)\r\n==============================\r\nUsing the tools in Windforge, build an enemy Airship that will be implemented into the final game (to our discretion)! This ship will appear randomly as an enemy encounter in the skies of Cordeus. Includes your name in the credits as a Descendant of the Aetherkin! (Includes all except previous three rewards.)

ARCHITECT\r\n==============================\r\nUsing the tools in Windforge, build and name a town! Populate it with NPCs, give them names and even determine their speech! (to our discretion) Includes your name in the credits as a Duke / Duchess of [Your Town's Name]! (Includes all except Enemy Ship Design and Original Sketch rewards.)
